name: Glass, Shatter
description:
Vanessa Arya lives happily with her mother. After a fleeting moment in the snow, however, her questions begin to pile to a point she can bear no longer.

Cyen Smith has lost himself in a place that's supposed to be full of fun. Unable to return to his family, he mires himself in a helplessness unable to be sated.

River Evans has lost sight of the reality he wants. Still, he cannot help but hope.

>Three stories split between ~4k words!

>Moving illustrations!

>The prelude to a much larger story!

>...And something secret :>

Writing, art, and coding are all done by me! There is no music/sound effects for this. However, I'm open to feedback about adding either of those things if it feels like it's needed!

Content warnings for this piece: body horror.

This is the prelude to a current project of mine. It is not necessary to understand the story but it is very much supplementary to it! There are a lot of hints to future story developments in here: as well as references that won't make sense until you come back to read this at a much later date (as is intended :D)!
